mapper.insert: insert into SECTION (ID, SECTION_NAME, RIVER_TYPE, LOCATION, BELONG_RIVER, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, WQ_MONITOR, WT_MONITOR, GS_MONITOR, AE_MONITOR, TE_MONITOR, HM_MONITOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, CLIMATE_MONITOR, ATOMIZATION_MONITOR, HYDR_MONITOR, SERIAL_NUM) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riverType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belongRiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{wqMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wtMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gsMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{aeMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{teMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hmMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{climateMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{atomizationMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hydrMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update SECTION set SECTION_NAME = #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIVER_TYPE = #{riverType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BELONG_RIVER = #{belongRiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, WQ_MONITOR = #{wqMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WT_MONITOR = #{wtMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GS_MONITOR = #{gsMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AE_MONITOR = #{aeMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TE_MONITOR = #{teMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HM_MONITOR = #{hmMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLIMATE_MONITOR = #{climateMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ATOMIZATION_MONITOR = #{atomizationMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HYDR_MONITOR = #{hydrMonitor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SERIAL_NUM = #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_NAME, RIVER_TYPE, LOCATION, BELONG_RIVER, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, WQ_MONITOR, WT_MONITOR, GS_MONITOR, AE_MONITOR, TE_MONITOR, HM_MONITOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, CLIMATE_MONITOR, ATOMIZATION_MONITOR, HYDR_MONITOR, SERIAL_NUM from SECTION where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, SECTION_NAME, RIVER_TYPE, LOCATION, BELONG_RIVER, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, WQ_MONITOR, WT_MONITOR, GS_MONITOR, AE_MONITOR, TE_MONITOR, HM_MONITOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, CLIMATE_MONITOR, ATOMIZATION_MONITOR, HYDR_MONITOR, SERIAL_NUM from SECTION
